title: Where to find green small business grants - Small Business UK - http://smallbusiness.co.uk
summary: This article provides a comprehensive list of eco-friendly business grants available in the UK. It covers grants offered by local authorities, government agencies, and other organizations, categorized by region. The grants aim to support businesses in adopting green technologies, reducing carbon emissions, and promoting sustainable practices.
likely_naics_codes: ['423820', 'Renewable and Alternative Energy Merchant Wholesalers', '541330', 'Engineering Services', '561430', 'Environmental Consulting Services', '237120', 'Heavy and Civil Engineering Construction']
greenwashing: The article does not present any specific examples of greenwashing, but it does mention that some grants may be used for green improvements that are not environmentally friendly.
